title: Game Of Thrones fans swoon as Jason Momoa runs to greet Emilia Clarke
text:
Reunited and it looks so good (Picture: PA)

Game Of Thrones fans were left swooning on Friday as Jason Momoa was reunited with Emilia Clarke on The Graham Norton Show and ran straight to his former co-star first.

The pair starred as Khal Drogo and Daenerys Targaryen in the hit Sky drama and fans’ hearts were left full when Jason appeared on screen and greeted his on-screen wife first, saying: ‘Hi baby.’

‘Omg the way Jason said hi to Emilia first was so cute,’ shared on fan, while another freaked out over the ‘precious babies’ as Jason greeted Emilia first.

‘The way Emilia and Jason hype each other up. Their friendship is so pure omg,’ gushed a fangirl of the pair.

‘Emilia Clarke and Jason Momoa are so CUTE!’ shared another as one viewer couldn’t believe her eyes: ‘WAIT EMILIA AND JASON REUNION’.

Yes, it’s true.

In season one Daenerys and Drogo fell madly in love, but it was cut brutally short when a festering arrow wound caused Drogo to fall into a coma.

The Mother of Dragons didn’t fare much better in the end, as she was murdered by her lover Jon Snow (Kit Harington), who feared she would become a tyrant if she took the Iron Throne.

Daenerys and Khal Drogo were lovers and husband and wife in Game of Thrones (Picture: HBO)

On the show, Jason promoted his new TV series See and also teased the possibility of a sequel to Aquaman.

He revealed on the show: ‘We will be back – probably in a year from now. I was very excited about the reaction. We have a script, which we’ve pitched and I’ m very passionate about it.’

Jason Momoa and Emilia Clarke joined Regina King on The Graham Norton Show (Picture: PA)

Camila Cabello also appeared on the show to perform her new single Liar – and it turns out she’s just as much as a fangirl as we are.

After performing her single Liar, she uses the opportunity to give Emilia a gift and tell her how much she loves the show, which ended earlier this year.

Meeting her on the Graham Norton sofa, she gives Emilia a tiny dragon, a spot-on present for the Mother of dragons herself.

The singer reveals: ‘I am the biggest Game of Thrones fan in the entire world. I am just freaking out to meet you guys. I literally went through all eight seasons in a month this year.’
